title: Searching for Font!
content:
Hi again ladies and gents.

Racking the ol' brain to find the font used on this book for a project for a friend. Any assistance would be muchly appreciated! Cheers!!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018063342im_/http:/typophile.com/files/5MM-Book-Font_4636.jpg)
author: nicholasmlward

comments.content: Looks like Bickham Script Pro Bold.
Hey there Atwe, Thanks a bunch!
